name: Muzical Touch
description:
Muzical Touch is a game where you create music using buttons in order to shape your own track out of the instrumental loops. This game was a collaboration project between the following people:

Project Manager / Audio - Renèe Park

Composition - Taylor Pampling

Game Developer - Victor Weidar

Graphic Design - Felicity Cooper
